comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly decorated for the coronation of George V or the "royal progress" the following day (June 23, 1911). See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163698472/ for a photo of the progress nearby.

comment.author: 92943860@N00
comment._content: All the vehicles here are horse drawn. The last horse drawn omnibus in London  was withdrawn in October 1911 but I think it odd that there are no motor vehicles at all in shot in 1911. This could just as easily be Edward VII's coronation decoration in 1902
